name: MODUNIVAR.Rproj
content:
Version: 1.0

RestoreWorkspace: Default
SaveWorkspace: Default
AlwaysSaveHistory: Default

EnableCodeIndexing: Yes
UseSpacesForTab: Yes
NumSpacesForTab: 2
Encoding: UTF-8

RnwWeave: Sweave
LaTeX: pdfLaTeX

name: global.R
content:
webr::install(c("shiny","shinydashboard","shinythemes","shinyWidgets","shinyjs",
                "lattice","ggplot2", "ggiraph","tools","DT","RcmdrMisc","car",
                "lmtest","outliers","MESS","pwr"))


library(shiny)
library(shinydashboard)
library(shinythemes)
library(shinyWidgets)
library(shinyjs)
library(lattice)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggiraph)
library(tools)
library(DT)
library(RcmdrMisc)
library(car)
library(lmtest)
library(outliers)
library(MESS)
library(pwr)

options(warn = -1)
options(shiny.maxRequestSize = 30 * 1024 ^ 2)
